verses.roman:
brahmāṇḍānurūpa brahmāra śarīra-vadana
ei-rūpe pāli āmi brahmāṇḍera gaṇa

synonyms: brahmāṇḍa-anurūpa—according to the size of a universe; brahmāra—of Lord Brahmā; śarīra-vadana—heads on the body; ei-rūpe—in this way; pāli āmi—I maintain; brahmāṇḍera gaṇa—all the innumerable groups of universes.
translation: " 'According to the size of the universe, there are so many heads on the body of Brahmā. In this way I maintain innumerable universes [brahmāṇḍas].
